item.title: Convergence of graph Laplacian to smooth Laplacian
item.description: \[ \newcommand{\R}{\mathbb{R}} \newcommand{\vol}{\mathrm{vol}}\] I want to consider an embedded closed submanifold \(\Sigma\) of dimension \(d\) in an ambient Euclidean space \(\R^N\). By randomly selecting \(n\) points \(\{x_i\}\) from \(\Sigma\) we can build a complete graph \(G=(V,E)\), and can weight the graph by some function dependent on the distance between points \(x_i, x_j\) as well as on a scaling parameter \(h\). Associated with the graph is a Graph Laplacian \(L_h\), an \(n\times n\) non-negative symmetric matrix.
